CampaignShare.name: CampaignShare
CampaignShare.description: Represents a sharing entry on a Campaign.

CampaignId.description: ID of the Campaign associated with this sharing entry. This field can't be updated.

CampaignAccessLevel.description: Level of access that the User or Group has to the Campaign. The possible values are: Read Edit All (This value is not valid for creating or updating records.) This field must be set to an access level that is higher than the organization’s default access level for Campaign.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the User or Group that has been given access to the Campaign. This field can't be updated.
